recipe.title: Carrot Cake
recipe.ingredients: 1 C Bran 1/2 C Wheatgerm 1 C Flour 1 tsp Soda 1 tsp Baking Powder 2 tsp Mixed Spice 3 eggs 3/4 C sugar 1/2 C oil 2 1/2 C carrot 1 C raisins 1/2 C walnuts
recipe.steps:
Sift Dry Ingredients Beat eggs, oil and sugar Combine Altogether with carrot and raisins Bake 180C 40 mins
Optional: Add 1 tsp grated orange or 1/2 - 3/4 C crushed pineapple or one mashed banana.
